description: Alterations to entrances on Almeida Street and Studd Street, alterations to callers office, provision of a new gatehouse and the erection of a single storey extension. Applicant's Plan Nos:  55-136-01A,02C,04,05A,06A,07,08, 09 and one unnumbered drawing, all as amended by applicants letter dated 31st October 1996.
decision_conditions:
CONDITION: The development hereby approved shall be completed in all respects in accordance with the plans and details submitted and approved, and no change therefrom shall take place without the prior and express permission of the Local Planning Authority. 

 REASON: To ensure that the Authority may be fully satisfied that the detail of the proposal to which it gives planning permission is implemented exactly, because of the nature of the development.
